item.title: SERVICE-minimal
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row background_color="#f2f2f2" row_padding_top="200" row_padding_bottom="80"][vc_column width="1/4"][/vc_column][vc_column width="3/4"][vc_column_text text_animation="fade-in-bottom" text_animation_delay="50"]Service.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row background_color="#f2f2f2"][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_column_text text_animation="fade-in" text_animation_delay="100"]

Imagination is the key to success, but without good assets, there won't be any business to imagine it. For an online business a great website with great customer experience is crucial.

item.excerpt:encoded: If you enjoy a good sale and an on budget shopping experience wait for the end of season sale of Cloth Diva in the 5th avenue. In normal sales buying a blouse in this store may cost from 600-900 dollars while on sale the same cloth costs about 100 dollars or less.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Guys I have to say that this theme is stunning. I’ve never seen such broad features in an ecommerce theme. The loading time is actually better than any other theme and the design is creative yet simple. What is the name of it? Where can I buy it?
Dear Monica, first of all thank you for the compliments, our theme’s name is Vitrine, you can download it from ThemeForest.

I was surfing web and accidentally found your website. I was looking around and never thought that this is a mock up until I read previous comment. Your theme, Vitrine, is perfect and can simply be the best WooCommerce theme on ThemeForest even it may be the best ecommerce theme of 2016.

She packed her seven versalia, put her initial into the belt and made herself on the way." text_content="The Big Oxmox advised her not to do so, because there were thousands of bad Commas, wild Question Marks and devious Semikoli, but the Little Blind Text didn’t listen. She packed her seven versalia, put her initial into the belt and made herself on the way. When she reached the first hills of the Italic Mountains. When she reached the first hills of the Italic Mountains, she had a last view back on the skyline of her hometown Bookmarks grove, the headline of Alphabet Village and the subline of her own road, the Line Lane. But nothing the copy said could convince her and so it didn’t take long until a few insidious Copy Writers ambushed her, made her drunk with Longe and Parole and dragged her into their agency" content_fontsize="14" text_animation="fade-in-right"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6" offset="vc_hidden-sm"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="full_width"][vc_column][animatedtext title="#Made With Pride " animatedtext_style="text_only" title_back_color="#da2d2f" animatedtext_font_size="10" animatedtext_speed="16"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height="true" gap="35" row_padding_top="100" row_padding_bottom="100"][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-2 vc_col-md-2"][vc_empty_space height="15px"][textbox title="Our Clients" title_color="#3b3b3b" title_fontsize="24" text_under_align="center" subtitle_color="#898989"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6" vertical_position="middle" offset="vc_hidden-sm"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" offset="vc_col-lg-2 vc_col-md-2"][textbox text_content="Concept – Jane Gallingor Editing – Matthew Carter Production – Justin Govender" content_fontsize="16" text_animation="fade-in-bottom" text_animation_delay="200"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" offset="vc_col-lg-2 vc_col-md-2"][textbox text_content="Mix - Austin Morgan photography - Alex Monez executor - Monica Bastini" content_fontsize="16" text_animation="fade-in-bottom" text_animation_delay="400"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" offset="vc_col-lg-2 vc_col-md-2"][textbox text_content="Illustration - Sophia Kingly Material - Rosa Hamilton Marketing- Xulio Igeort" content_fontsize="16" text_animation="fade-in-bottom" text_animation_delay="600"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6" offset="vc_hidden-sm"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

But nothing the copy said could convince her and so it didn’t take long until a few insidious Copy Writers ambushed her, made her drunk with Longe and Parole and dragged her into their agency" content_fontsize="14" text_animation="fade-in-right"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/12" offset="vc_hidden-sm"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/12"][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/6"][image_carousel gutter="no" images="EPICO_DEMO_IMAGE_ID, EPICO_DEMO_IMAGE_ID, EPICO_DEMO_IMAGE_ID, EPICO_DEMO_IMAGE_ID, EPICO_DEMO_IMAGE_ID"][vc_column_text]

I bought it as a present but the packaging was not as beautiful as I requested. I still vote 4 stars because the product itself was amazing.
If you liked this product don’t hesitate to buy it. The material is beautiful and durable, at the same time it is a great present for those you love.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="10px"][vc_column_text]DARK AGED Model is 1.90m and is wearing a size 33/32 (Waist 84cm, Hips 100cm).[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="200px"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/12"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_type="parallax" background_img_id="EPICO_DEMO_IMAGE_ID" row_padding_top="150" row_padding_bottom="150" min_height="400"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1468326269795{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}"][custom_title title="Furniture Products" google_fonts="font_family:Montserrat%3Aregular%2C700|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal" title_color="#ffffff" title_fontsize="100" title_background_style="textbackground" bg_title="50%" bg_title_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.2)"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1468326027326{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}"][button button_hover_style="style2" button_bg_style="fill" text="Shop Now" url="url:%23|||" alignment="center" button_text_color="#262626" button_text_hover_color="#ffffff" button_bg_border_color="#ffffff" button_border_radius="20px" button_border_width="2px"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
item.excerpt:encoded: Vitrine products are guaranteed to benefit from the highest quality products and the most trusted brands around the globe. Our main intention is to gain our customer’s trust and make them a secure and win-win shopping experience. We may not be the best but we are trying hard to be the best.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: The most perfect shopping experience, product arrived on time, I intended to come back soon for another purchase.
I bought it as a present but the packaging was not as beautiful as I requested. I still vote 4 stars because the product itself was amazing.
If you liked this product don’t hesitate to buy it. The material is beautiful and durable, at the same time it is a great present for those you love.
